Job Title: Outsides Sales Specialist

Location: Fort Lauderdale, FL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Public Relations, Sales

Description:
Outsides Sales SpecialistEntry-LevelFull training provided
Company Overview:Citizendum stands as a pioneering force in the marketing industry, dedicated to delivering innovative solutions and unparalleled service to our esteemed clientele. With an unwavering commitment to excellence, we're expanding our team and seeking a talented Sales and Marketing Specialist to join our Fort Lauderdale office.
Job Description:As an Outside Sales Specialist, you will be responsible for identifying, prospecting, and acquiring new clients in designated geographic territories. This role offers an exciting opportunity for individuals with a passion for sales, strong communication skills, and a proactive approach to building relationships. You will work closely with our sales team to drive revenue growth and expand our market presence.
Responsibilities:Conduct face-to-face encounters and presentations to introduce our products/services and demonstrate value to prospects.Carry out sales.Build and maintain strong relationships with clients, understanding their needs and providing tailored solutions.Develop and execute sales strategies to achieve sales targets and objectives.Collaborate with internal teams to ensure seamless execution of sales initiatives and projects.Keep abreast of industry trends, market conditions, and competitor activities to identify opportunities and challenges.Prepare and present sales proposals, quotes, and contracts to prospects, negotiating terms and closing deals.Maintain accurate records of sales activities, pipeline, and client interactions using CRM software.Provide ongoing support and assistance to clients to ensure satisfaction and promote long-term relationships.

Qualifications:Strong prospecting and networking skills, with the ability to uncover opportunities and cultivate relationships.Excellent communication, negotiation, and presentation skills.Results-oriented mindset with a track record of meeting or exceeding sales targets.Self-motivated and driven to succeed, with a proactive and persistent approach to sales.Ability to work independently and manage time effectively in a remote work environment.Eagerness to learn and a commitment to achieving success.
Benefits:Competitive compensation package.Comprehensive training and support to help you succeed in your role.Opportunity for career growth and advancement within a fast-growing company.Collaborative and supportive team environment where your contributions are valued and recognized.Chance to represent a leading company and make a meaningful impact in the industry.
How to Apply:Interested candidates are encouraged to submit their applications via LinkedIn at the earliest opportunity.
Outsides Sales SpecialistEntry-LevelFull training provided

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
